FROM: telco2@telco2 TO: management@telco7
I am pleased to report that the decryptor works as expected. That should buy us some time.
I've deployed the decryptor to telco7, but I'm keeping a local copy on telco2 for further development. Plus, there are some files here I'd like to secure.
Best, telco2

Best regards, Management
